instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00923-05 No Power
threads.message:
Hi Guys.

i have a board 820-923-05 not powering on took some measurements shorted on C3200 and PPDCIN_G3H is only 5v. Any suggestions please?

Thanks :cool:

threads.title: 820-00923-05 No Power
threads.message:
Do you mean C3200 was shorted and changed?
Or you still have a short on 3V3_G3H rail?

All 4 USB-C ports show same voltage/current?
Check diode mode to ground on all CD3215s power rails.
U3200 could be the affected one.

threads.title: 820-00923-05 No Power
threads.message: Thanks 2Informaticos, still waiting from the client to approve the repair and in the meantime i ordered type C controllers just in case i need them just couldn't find a stencil. Will update asap... :D
